title: [HIGH] Live Crypto Exchange Integration via CCXT
body:
## Vision Gap

CCXT is installed but NOT actively used. K.I.T. should trade on ALL major crypto exchanges.

## Current State
- CCXT package installed
- Exchange connector skill exists but uses mock data
- No real balance fetching
- No real order execution

## Required Implementation

### Supported Exchanges (Priority)
1. Binance (Spot + Futures)
2. Coinbase
3. Kraken
4. KuCoin
5. Bybit
6. OKX

### Features Needed
- [ ] Real-time balance fetching
- [ ] Market/Limit order execution
- [ ] Position management
- [ ] Order book access
- [ ] Trade history
- [ ] WebSocket price feeds
- [ ] Multi-exchange portfolio aggregation

### API Key Management
- Secure storage (encrypted)
- Multiple accounts per exchange
- Read-only vs trading permissions

## Example Usage
```typescript
await kit.exchange.buy('binance', 'BTC/USDT', 0.1);
await kit.exchange.getBalance('all');
await kit.exchange.getOpenOrders('binance');
```

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Can connect to real exchanges
- [ ] Balances reflect actual holdings
- [ ] Orders execute successfully
- [ ] Errors handled gracefully

## Priority: HIGH
